If the case for ip is 127.0.0.1, it may be the original configuration of the test environment:
127.0.0.1 localhost localhost.localdomain localhost4 localhost4.localdomain4
::1 localhost localhost.localdomain localhost6 localhost6.localdomain6
The solution is two ways:
1,127.0.0.1 modified to your real ip
2, modify the Linux host name, the real Ip and hostname are associated

---
如果对于ip是127.0.0.1的情况，可能是测试环境   原始的配置：
127.0.0.1   localhost localhost.localdomain localhost4 localhost4.localdomain4                                                                                                               
::1         localhost localhost.localdomain localhost6 localhost6.localdomain6
解决方法两种方式：
1，127.0.0.1 修改成你真实ip
2，修改linux主机名称，将真实的Ip和hostname对应起来

Thank you very much for finding this problem.

> Start user kerberos authentication?
> The resource upload calls the hadoop api,
> Another one is that tenants also need to be certified in kerberos, otherwise they will not pass. We are called by sudo -u tenant sh /xxx.command

What do you mean by manually maintaining the kerberos ticket of the logged in user on each worker's server?

---
> 启动用户kerberos中认证了吗？
> 资源上传调用的是hadoop api，
> 还有一个就是租户也是需要在kerberos认证的，否则也通不过。我们是通过sudo -u 租户 sh /xxx.command方式调用的

你的意思是需要在每个Worker的服务器上手动维护登录用户的kerberos的Ticket？

Very cool!
Just meet my needs:
For example, if we have more than a dozen servers, we will execute the shell regularly, and these do not need to be restricted.
But when accessing our hive cluster, we want to limit the number of task instances due to limited resources.

---
very cool！
刚好满足我的需求：
比如说我们有十几台服务器，都会定时执行shell，这些不需要限制。
但当访问我们hive集群时候，由于资源有限，我们想限制这部分任务实例个数。

This complement function is too important, suggesting a practice, such as the complement date 2018.01.01 ~ 2019.05.04 running logic:

1. The program determines if a complement is needed, and if necessary, writes the complement time to a variable that can be obtained by $[yymmdd]
2. The platform can get the complement time by setting the global variable DATA=$[yymmdd]. When the script is running, the complement time can be obtained through the global variable to adjust the running time.

---
这个补数功能太重要了，建议一种做法，比如补数日期 2018.01.01 ~ 2019.05.04 运行逻辑:

1. 程序判断是否需要补数，如果需要，则把补数时间写入到可以通过$[yymmdd]获取到的变量中
2. 平台通过设置全局变量 DATA=$[yymmdd],则可以拿到补数时间，然后脚本运行的时候，可以通过全局变量获得补数时间，从而调整运行时间

1, you need to configure export PYTHON_HOME=/opt/Python-3.7.0/python in conf/env. Configure your Python absolute path, not PYTHON_HOME. If not, take the default python.
Because it is considered that not all PYTHON_HOME is python below, it may be PYTHON_HOME/bin/python, or so on.
2, we have a configuration format, it is best to fill in our format

---
1，需要在conf/env中配置 export PYTHON_HOME=/opt/Python-3.7.0/python。配置你的Python绝对路径，不是PYTHON_HOME。如果没有，则走默认的python。
因为考虑到不一定所有的PYTHON_HOME下面都是python，也可能是PYTHON_HOME/bin/python,或者等等。
2，我们有配置格式，最好按照我们的格式填写

If you are using nginx, set the upload size
Edit the configuration file vi /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

Change upload size
Client_max_body_size 1024m

---

编辑配置文件 vi /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

更改上传大小
client_max_body_size 1024m

Thanks for the reply, the problem has been solved, the version of Google Chrome is old, and the latest version of the browser has been updated.

From: "乔占卫"<notifications@github.com>;
Delivery time: May 24, 2015 (Friday) 5:25 PM
To: "analysys/EasyScheduler"<EasyScheduler@noreply.github.com>;
Cc: "Mr. Little" <821555203@qq.com>; "Author" <author@noreply.github.com>;
Subject: Re: [analysys/EasyScheduler] Uploading a large file jam (#341)




If you are using nginx, set the upload size
  Edit the configuration file vi /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
 
Change upload size
  Client_max_body_size 1024m

I handled this problem in my own way.
1. Add the type of task in processDao.taskZkInfo (line 954) to form
   Task type_process instance priority_process instance id_task priority_task id.

2. In taskQueueZkImpl.poll (line 141), determine that the current worker can handle those task types, and discard if not supported.
Remove the task type taskId and make a priority comparison.

---
我通过我自己的方式,把这个问题处理了。
1.在processDao.taskZkInfo（954行） 中添加task的类型，形成 
  task类型_流程实例优先级_流程实例id_任务优先级_任务id 。

2.在taskQueueZkImpl.poll(141行) ，判断当前worker能处理那些task类型，如果不支持就丢弃。
把 task类型 taskId 中去掉，做优先级比较。

good issue, thx!

Can you describe more in detail?  Is it a tenant for a workflow or a tenant for each task?

> good issue, thx!
>
> Can you describe more in detail? Is it a tenant for a workflow or a tenant for each task?

When the workflow with the same process is relatively long, it involves the switching between offline and online servers and different projects. The user's permissions between different servers may not be the same, especially offline. This involves the problem of tenant switching when writing a workflow.

---
> good issue, thx!
> 
> Can you describe more in detail? Is it a tenant for a workflow or a tenant for each task?

同一个流程比较长的工作流的时候因为涉及到离线和线上服务器以及不同项目之间的切换，该用户在不同服务器之间的权限不一定一致，特别是离线跟线上。这样编写工作流的时候就涉及到租户切换的问题了。

We are planning to implement a workflow for a tenant. If there are multiple tenants that need to switch, you can use a sub-workflow. Can such an implementation meet your needs?

---

我们正打算实现一个工作流对应一个租户，如果有多个租户需要切换使用，可以使用子工作流，这样的实现是否可以满足您的需求呢？

> We are planning to implement a workflow for a tenant. If there are multiple tenants that need to switch, you can use a sub-workflow. Can such an implementation meet your needs?
> 
> 我们正打算实现一个工作流对应一个租户，如果有多个租户需要切换使用，可以使用子工作流，这样的实现是否可以满足您的需求呢？

Can, expect

> 如果需要罗列的话，希望支持大数据和关系库的主流数据
> 1、greenplum
> 2、clickhouse
> 3、mysql、oracle、postgresql、sqlserver
> 4、hive、spark
> 5、标准jdbc的通用数据库

Also need http type and ES, mongodb

Each process definition can be bound to a tenant. The default is the tenant to which the creator belongs, or you can select another tenant.
When any user is executing this workflow, the worker will use this binding tenant to perform the tasks in the workflow.
Multiple sub-workflows can be added to a workflow. When a sub-workflow is executed, the sub-workflow-bound tenant is used to perform the task.

---
每个流程定义可以绑定一个租户，默认是创建者所属的租户，也可以选择其他租户。
任何一个用户在执行这个工作流的时候，worker会使用这个绑定租户执行工作流里面的任务。
一个工作流里面可以添加多个子工作流，子工作流执行的时候，会使用子工作流绑定的租户执行任务。

from version 1.0.3,  workflow can be deleted when  it offline, like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48329107/58848145-07887a80-86b8-11e9-83e9-006418879f06.png)

Excuse me, if, before restarting, set all the tasks in the execution state to failure, then after the restart, es will retry all the failed tasks, so that all the tasks before the restart in disguise, this solution can solve this problem?

---
请问下，如果，在重启之前，把所有正在执行的任务状态全部设置为失败， 那重启之后，es会重试所有失败的任务，这样变相重启之前所有的任务, 这个方案是可以解决这个问题？

The master monitors the master service and the worker service, so as long as the master survives normally, the worker node can be missed.
  But for the case where the single master does not survive normally:
  1, the master is older than the worker
  Master is only the monitoring of the process instance, after the worker is dropped, because the master has been lost, can not take the master to the staff fault-tolerant
  So if the task is always in the running state after the worker is dropped, then the master restarts and the master is fault-tolerant, and the process is monitored.
  However, the worker monitoring thread has been dropped and the task status is not updated. So the process is gone.
  2, worker startup needs self-confidence (need to join)
  When the worker starts, it needs to judge whether the running task on all the down worker nodes needs to be judged whether it has been run or not.
  The required state is set to success. For the running (yarn) job, it needs to be killed, the modified state is fault tolerant, and the task is resubmitted.

---
 master监控master服务和worker服务，所以只要master正常存活，worker节点掉是可以容错过来的。
 但是对于单master不正常存活的情况下：
 1，master掉的比worker早的情况
 master掉只是流程实例的监控掉了，worker掉了之后，因为master已经掉了，不能走master对worker容错了
 所以如果worker掉之后task一直处于running状态，那master重新启动之后走master自容错，流程被监控起来了，
 但是worker监控线程已经掉了，task状态不会更新。所以流程也就废了
 2，worker启动需要自容错（需要加入）
 worker启动的时候，需要把所有down的worker节点上正在运行的任务需要判断是否已经运行完，对已经运行完的
 需要状态置成成功，对于正在运行的（yarn）作业需要kill掉，修改状态为容错，任务进行重新提交

Under the premise that the worker startup has not been added to the fault, after the restart of the service (master, worker), is it possible to reschedule the unfinished tasks before the restart?

---
在worker启动还没有加入自容错的前提下，服务(master, worker)重启之后，是否可以做到把重启之前未完成的任务重新调度一遍？

Similar to:
1 After the master restarts, scan the database, find an incomplete workflow instance, and then start scheduling again.
2 master assigns unfinished tasks to workers

---
类似于：
1 master重启后，扫描一下数据库，发现有未完成的工作流实例，然后重新开始调度
2 master把未完成的任务分配给worker

Master self-fault can also be used to run the task task, but
1, when the master starts, there is already fault tolerance of the process, and it is in the zk distributed lock. If the worker task is fault-tolerant, it may be time consuming, and the startup of other masters is blocked.
2, our design philosophy is that the master does not modify the task state as much as possible, just monitor the task state, the worker changes the task state
3, the master does the task task startup task fault tolerance, if there is no worker state, in fact, still can not work

---
master自容错也是可以做容正在运行的task任务的，但是
1，master启动的时候已经有流程的容错，而且是在zk分布式锁中的，如果再加入worker task容错，可能会很耗时，对其他master的启动是阻塞的
2，我们的设计理念是master尽量不修改task状态，只是监控task状态，worker修改task状态
3，master做启动task running任务容错，如果没有一个worker的状态情况下，其实还是不能工作

The db service is gone, it will definitely cause the failure of the schedule, but how to fail, we have not tested this, we need to test it.

---
db服务掉了，肯定会引起调度的失败的，但是怎么失败方式，我们这还没有测试过，需要测试一下

Still do not quite understand what you mean, I understand the task scheduling process like this:
1) Create a workflow Click "Start" operation
2) Master starts scheduling this task (do DAG division)
3) master assigns the task to the worker and creates the task zk node
4) The worker starts executing the task and updates the task status, then deletes the task zk node
If you can use a script to trigger a failed task "start" operation, can you perform steps 1-4? This does not need to modify the master & worker code to achieve results?

---
还是不太明白你的意思，我理解任务的调度流程这样:  
1) 创建一个工作流 点击“启动”操作
2）master开始调度这个任务(做DAG划分)
3） master把任务分配给worker，同时创建任务zk节点
4） worker开始执行任务，并更新任务状态，然后删除任务zk节点 
如果可以用脚本触发失败的任务“启动”操作，是否可以执行1-4步骤？  这样不需要修改 master & worker的代码就可以达到效果？

If this is done, before the restart, we use the script to modify the database workflow state, set the workflow state to failure, after the service starts, use the script to traverse all the failed tasks, and then use the script to simulate the "start" operation, to achieve The effect of rescheduled tasks

---
如果这样做成立的话，在重启之前，我们用脚本修改数据库工作流状态，把工作流的状态设置为失败，服务启动后，在使用脚本遍历所有失败任务，然后用脚本 模拟“启动”操作，达到重新调度的任务的效果

Currently does not support multi-cluster, you can try this,
If only one API Server is started, since the uploaded files need to be saved on hdfs, if multiple workers work at the same time, you need to use the same hdfs configuration, involving hadoop.properties, hdfs-site.xml, core-site. Xml

If you start 2 API Servers, you can use different hdfs configurations for each worker.

---
当前不支持多集群，你这个尝试是可以的，
如果只启动1个API Server的话，因为上传文件需要保存在hdfs上，所以如果多个worker同时工作的话，需要使用同一个hdfs配置，涉及到hadoop.properties, hdfs-site.xml，core-site.xml

如果启动2个API Server的话，可以每个Worker使用不同的hdfs配置

1. Wait for the master to start before the worker starts.
2. After the master starts, it executes the process and task fault tolerance mechanism.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29528966/58925076-d02dd280-8778-11e9-9596-2489dba3b803.png)

---
1. worker启动之前先等待master启动。
2. master启动以后执行流程和任务容错机制。

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29528966/58925076-d02dd280-8778-11e9-9596-2489dba3b803.png)

It is currently judged according to natural days, at the end of last month: the judgment time is the workflow A start_time/scheduler_time between '2019-05-31 00:00:00' and '2019-05-31 23:59:59'

Last month: It is judged that there is an A instance completed every day from the 1st to the end of the month.

Last week: There are completed A instances 7 days last week.

The first two days: Judging yesterday and the day before yesterday, there must be a completed A instance for two days.

---
目前是按照自然天来判断，上月末：判断时间是工作流A start_time/scheduler_time  between '2019-05-31 00:00:00' and '2019-05-31 23:59:59'

上月：是判断上个月从1号到月末每天都要有完成的A实例

上周： 上周7天都要有完成的A实例。

前两天： 判断昨天和前天，两天都要有完成的A实例。

If HDFS is not started, the 1.0.3 version tenant cannot be deleted. This is a bug, we will modify this issue in the upcoming release.

> Well, this is the idea of fixing the problem. I mean, I want to solve the problem on my side temporarily. Is there any good advice, such as restarting the project? Or rebuild the database? Thank you

Sorry, we need more environment and log support to see the problem.
The normal registration process is
Master/worker startup -> Register zk directory -> Add mysql record.

Your problem is that adding mysql is not successful, you can try to restart the worker service.

> 嗯嗯，这是修复问题的思路，我的意思是我想先临时解决我这边的问题，有没有好的建议，比如重启项目？或者重建数据库？谢谢

很抱歉，这个问题我们需要更多环境和日志的支持，才能看到问题所在。
正常注册流程是
master/worker启动 -> 注册zk目录 -> 添加mysql记录。

你这个问题感觉是添加mysql没有成功，可以重启一下worker服务试试。
